attributes.background:
Madam Prime Minister,
 The detention of the National Publicity Secretary of the Sierra Leone Peoples Party (SLPP), the main opposition in Sierra Leone is diabolical plan of  President Koroma’s APC to prolong his  stay in power and create chaos.
Please intervene

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition asking the UK Government to condemn the detention of opposition members in Sierra Leone.
